title: BidiUtil in win32 has incorrect usage of Class.forName()
description: The current implementation of BidiUtil in win32 contains incorrect usage of Class.forName().
OB: The current code does not specify how to use Class.forName() correctly in the BidiUtil class for win32.
EB: The Class.forName() usage in the BidiUtil class for win32 should be updated to ensure correct functionality.
SR: To fix the issue, please change the line above to: static Callback callback = new Callback(new BidiUtil().getClass(), 'windowProc', 4); Make sure to test the change to ensure it has the desired effect.
